verses.verse: And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7495>physicians<s%> to <S%H2590>embalm<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> and the <S%H7495>physicians<s%> <S%H2590>embalmed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> for him; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of those which are <S%H2590>embalmed:<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H1058>mourned<s%> for him threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H1068>mourning<s%> were <S%H5674>past,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H1696>speak,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

My <S%H1>father<s%> made me <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Lo,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H4191>die:<s%> in my <S%H6913>grave<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H3738>digged<s%> for me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shalt thou <S%H6912>bury<s%> me. <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore let me go <S%H5927>up,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> and <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and I will come <S%H7725>again.<s%>
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Go <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1>father,<s%> according <S%H834>as<s%> he made thee <S%H7650>swear.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> and <S%H854>with<s%> him went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> their little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and their <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and their <S%H1241>herds,<s%> they <S%H5800>left<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%>

And there went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen:<s%> and it <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H4264>company.<s%>

And they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H1637>threshingfloor<s%> of <S%H329>Atad,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5594>mourned<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>sore<s%> <S%H4553>lamentation:<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H60>mourning<s%> for his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And when the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H60>mourning<s%> in the <S%H1637>floor<s%> of <S%H329>Atad,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is a <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians:<s%> <S%H5921>wherefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of it was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H67>Abel-mizraim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
And his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> unto him according <S%H3651>as<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them:

For his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5375>carried<s%> him into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> of a burial <S%H6913>place<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H4471>Mamre.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H1931>he,<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him to <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%>

And when <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> will <S%H3863>peradventure<s%> <S%H7852>hate<s%> us, and will certainly <S%H7725>requite<s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853>us<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H1580>did<s%> unto him.

And they sent a <S%H6680>messenger<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thy <S%H1>father<s%> did <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> he <S%H4194>died,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

So <S%H3541><s%> shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H5375>Forgive,<s%> I pray <S%H577>thee<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> the <S%H6588>trespass<s%> of thy <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and their <S%H2403>sin;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H1580>did<s%> unto thee <S%H7451>evil:<s%> and <S%H6258>now,<s%> we pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H5375>forgive<s%> the <S%H6588>trespass<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>father.<s%> And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> when they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him.

And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> before his <S%H6440>face;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> we be thy <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H408>not:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> am <S%H589>I<s%> in the <S%H8478>place<s%> of <S%H430>God?<s%>

But as for <S%H859>you,<s%> ye <S%H2803>thought<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me; but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2803>meant<s%> it unto <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H4616>to<s%> bring to <S%H6213>pass,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> to save much people <S%H2421>alive.<s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H7227><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H3372>fear<s%> ye <S%H408>not:<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H3557>nourish<s%> you, and your little <S%H2945>ones.<s%> And he <S%H5162>comforted<s%> them, and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>kindly<s%> <S%H3820><s%> unto them.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H1931>he,<s%> and his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H8029>third<s%> generation: the <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> were brought <S%H3205>up<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1290>knees.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H4191>die:<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> will surely <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H6485><s%> you, and <S%H5927>bring<s%> you out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and to <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> took an <S%H7650>oath<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will surely <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H6485><s%> you, and ye shall carry <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> from <S%H4480>hence.<s%> <S%H2088><s%>

So <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> being a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old:<s%> and they <S%H2590>embalmed<s%> him, and he was <S%H3455>put<s%> in a <S%H727>coffin<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
